trans-unit.source: Implements the `Csc` task.
Use the `Csc` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
For usage and parameter information, see [Csc Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Csc"></xref> class.
Fills the specified commandLine parameter with switches and other information that can go into a response file.
Command line builder to add arguments to.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to compile code that uses the [unsafe](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) keyword.
For more information, see [/unsafe (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if will compile code that uses the [unsafe](../Topic/unsafe%20\(C%23%20Reference\).md) keyword; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns configuration information.
To be added.
Gets or sets the preferred base address at which to load a DLL.
The default base address for a DLL is set by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] common language runtime.
For more information, see [/baseaddress (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The preferred base address at which to load a DLL.
Compiles the project through the host object.
This method will get called during execution if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if compilation succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Csc` task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.
For more information, see [/checked (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether true if the `Csc` task should cause an exception at run time for integer arithmetic that overflows the bounds of the data type.
Gets or sets the list of warnings to be disabled.
For more information, see [/nowarn (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The list of warnings to be disabled.
Gets or sets the XML file to hold the documentation comments.
For more information, see [/doc (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The XML file to hold the documentation comments.
If true, outputs the line and column of the end location of each error.
Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
Gets or sets the method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.
This property can have a value of `prompt`, `send`, or `none`.
If the property is set to `prompt`, you will receive a prompt when an internal compiler error occurs.
The prompt lets you send a bug report electronically to Microsoft.
If the property is set to `send`, a bug report is sent automatically.
If the property is set to `none`, the error is reported only in the text output of the compiler.
Default is `none`.
For more information, see [/errorreport (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The method to report a C# internal compiler error to Microsoft.

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output (<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>) or to generate the name of the file in the compiler output (<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>).
The default is `false`.
For more information, see [/fullpaths (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Csc` task should generate the absolute path to the file in the compiler output; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the `Csc` task should generate the name of the file in the compiler output.
Returns the full file path of the Csc tool.
The full file path of the Csc tool.
Returns a host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.
This method will get called during execution of this task if a host object was passed to the `Csc` task.
A host object initialization status value that indicates what the next action should be.
Gets or sets the version of the language to use.
For more information, see [/langversion (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The version of the language to use.
Gets or sets an assembly whose non-public types a .netmodule can access.
For more information, see [/moduleassemblyname (C# Compiler Option)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An assembly whose non-public types a .netmodule can access.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Csc` task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll, which defines the entire System namespace.
Use this property if you want to define or create your own System namespace and objects.
For more information, see [/nostdlib (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Csc` task should prevent the import of mscorlib.dll; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the path of the .pdb file.
For more information, see [/pdb (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The path of the .pdb file.
The name of the language passed to the “/preferreduilang” compiler option.
If set to null, “/preferreduilang” is omitted and the compiler uses its default setting.
Returns the name of the language.
Returns the name of the Csc tool (csc.exe).
The name of the Csc tool (csc.exe).
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the `Csc` task should use the in-process compiler object, if available.
Used only by [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)].

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the `Csc` task should use the in-process compiler object, if available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the warning level for the compiler to display.
For more information, see [/warn (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The warning level for the compiler to display.
Gets or sets a list of warnings to treat as errors.
For more information, see [/warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The list of warnings to treat as errors.
Gets or sets a list of warnings that are not treated as errors.
For more information, see [/warnaserror (C# Compiler Options)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The list of warnings that are not treated as errors.
